column3: Latest;Kandal province:------ A man died in a amssage shop on December 15
column5: at 14:00 in Khsach Kandal district.------The victim was identified as Heng
column10: Kandal province.------The victim went to massage “744 Magic Hand” in the local village and recieved his rub down. Later
column11: he fell asleep and woke up complaining of  a headache
column12: sweating and sore limbs. The owner of the massage called a PassApp
column13: and he was taken to the district hospital
column14: where he died.------Experts concluded that the victim died of wind (*khyal
column16: which western medicine may attribute to a stroke/sudden aneurysm etc.).------After the inspection
column17: the body was handed over to the family for a traditional funeral. ------POST NEWS
